org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.lang

Class RestrictedTableVTI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.derby.vti.VTITemplate
      • org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.lang.RestrictedTableVTI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.sql.ResultSet, java.sql.Wrapper, org.apache.derby.vti.AwareVTI, org.apache.derby.vti.RestrictedVTI

    public class RestrictedTableVTI
extends org.apache.derby.vti.VTITemplate
implements org.apache.derby.vti.RestrictedVTI

    This class contains a table function which can be used to read data from a Derby table.
